casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lauren Elizabeth CROWE. No. 98P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 7, 2008. Vincent F. Rabil, for Crowe. Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 656 S.E.2d 688 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of March 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of March 2008."
